body:
I have just changed my mine craft name.
It took so long because i had to contact Mojang to change my email, my last one was inaccessible. My Youtube video i just uploaded had matty01matthew: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ur5OEyvhmn0
My next videos will be with Endertait :)
Thanks guys for all your support.
Matt

title: Changed My Name - Endertait
